dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notice ID: 9-109628]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 19, 2005 3:32 PM
To: mgm-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notice ID: 9-109628]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notice ID: 9-109628
Date: Tue, 19 Apr 2005 11:01:49 -0700
From: mgm-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
Reply-To: mgm-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Re:  Unauthorized Use of MGM Property
Notice ID:9-109628
Notice  Date:19 Apr 2005 17:34:04 GMT

Dear Sir or Madam:

MGM Inc. and its affiliated companies (collectively, "MGM") are the
exclusive owners of copyrights in motion pictures and television, including
the property listed below.

It has come to our attention that SBC is the service provider for the IP
address listed below, from which unauthorized copying and distribution
(downloading, uploading, file serving, file "swapping" or other similar
activities) of  MGM's (property)(s) listed below is taking place.  We
believe that the Internet access of the user engaging in this infringement
is provided by SBC or a downstream service provider who purchases this
connectivity from SBC.

This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act .  Depending upon
the type of service SBC is providing to this IP address, it may have legal
and/or equitable liability if it does not expeditiously remove or disable
access to the (property)(s) listed below, or if it fails to implement a
policy that provides for termination of subscribers who are repeat
infringers (see, 17 U.S.C.
